title: files inaccessable, class 'oca\files\lib\helper' not found  [5.0] [iis]
body:
hello!

### expected behaviour
clicking on a file should show it/download it.

### actual behaviour
after upgrading to oc5, no file can be opened, stating "cloud not found".

### steps to reproduce
1. log in
2. click on any file
3. error.
php.log says: [14-mar-2013 08:33:34 utc] php fatal error:  class 'oca\files\lib\helper' not found in c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\apps\files\ajax\getstoragestats.php on line 9

### server configuration
operating system: windows 2008 r2 up-to-date

web server: iis7.5

database: mysql

php version: 5.3.13

owncloud version: 5.0

### client configuration
browser: firefox 19

operating system: win7x64

### logs
#### web server error log
```
[14-mar-2013 08:02:44 utc] php fatal error:  class 'oca\files\lib\helper' not found in c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\apps\files\ajax\upload.php on line 16
[14-mar-2013 08:11:29 utc] php notice:  undefined index: server_signature in c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\tool.php on line 246
[14-mar-2013 08:11:46 utc] php warning:  fileowner(): stat failed for ./data in c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\tool.php on line 92
[14-mar-2013 08:12:13 utc] php warning:  chmod(): no such file or directory in c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\tool.php on line 206
[14-mar-2013 08:12:47 utc] php notice:  undefined index: server_signature in c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\tool.php on line 246
[14-mar-2013 08:12:50 utc] php warning:  fileowner(): stat failed for ./data in c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\tool.php on line 92
[14-mar-2013 08:28:40 utc] php fatal error:  class 'oca\files\lib\helper' not found in c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\apps\files\ajax\upload.php on line 16
[14-mar-2013 08:33:34 utc] php fatal error:  class 'oca\files\lib\helper' not found in c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\apps\files\ajax\getstoragestats.php on line 9
```
